shotgun_upgrades.name: Magnum Chamber
shotgun_upgrades.description: Increases score per shot but reduces ammo capacity.

shotgun_upgrades.name: Reinforced Barrel
shotgun_upgrades.description: Bullets shot at target's back gives small score bonus.

shotgun_upgrades.name: Double Barrel
shotgun_upgrades.description: Fires two shots at once, but longer reload time.

shotgun_upgrades.name: Duckhunter Choke
shotgun_upgrades.description: Increases score for shooting ducks but less for other targets.

shotgun_upgrades.name: Precision Choke
shotgun_upgrades.description: Increases score if fired while holding still.

shotgun_upgrades.name: Slug Barrel
shotgun_upgrades.description: Converts all shots to single high-scoring slugs instead of pellets.

bullet_types.name: Fire Shells
bullet_types.description: Burns targets on hit, giving small score over time.

bullet_types.name: Shock Shells
bullet_types.description: Stuns targets briefly, causing them to freeze in place.

bullet_types.name: Overpressured Shells
bullet_types.description: First shot after reloading gives extra score.

bullet_types.name: Slug Rounds
bullet_types.description: Converts all remaining bullets into a single slug, increasing power with bullet count.

bullet_types.name: Speeding Shells
bullet_types.description: Provides higher score but speeds up the shot target.

bullet_types.name: Expanding Shells
bullet_types.description: Increases target's size by a small amount.

power_ups.name: Faster Engine
power_ups.description: Reduces time taken for shot target to flip over.

power_ups.name: Lucky Shot
power_ups.description: Small chance for the shot to not cost a bullet.

power_ups.name: Multi-Kill Bonus
power_ups.description: Hitting multiple targets in quick succession increases score multiplier.

power_ups.name: time Extension
power_ups.description: Increases the time limit and bullets.
